summary.note: After PR #70 (AfterBranch fix) and PR #71 merge: microbench average error regressed to 41.17% (was 14.21%). All 7 PolyBench benchmarks now timeout at 5B cycle limit (regression). Data from accuracy-consolidated run 22069383457. See issue #149 for regression details.

polybench_regression.name: atax
polybench_regression.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit with only 953 instructions. Previously completed (CPI 0.186). Regression after PRs #66-#70.

polybench_regression.name: bicg
polybench_regression.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit with only 776 instructions. Previously completed (CPI 0.392). Regression after PRs #66-#70.

polybench_regression.name: jacobi-1d
polybench_regression.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit with only 1068 instructions. Regression after PRs #66-#70.

polybench_regression.name: mvt
polybench_regression.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit with only 459 instructions. Previously completed (CPI 0.279). Regression after PRs #66-#70.

polybench_regression.name: gemm
polybench_regression.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit with only 30912 instructions. Regression after PRs #66-#70.

polybench_regression.name: 2mm
polybench_regression.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit with only 167 instructions. Previously completed (CPI 0.340). Regression after PRs #66-#70.

polybench_regression.name: 3mm
polybench_regression.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit with only 197 instructions. Previously completed (CPI 0.343). Regression after PRs #66-#70.

infeasible.name: crc32
infeasible.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit at LOCAL_SCALE_FACTOR=1, CPU_MHZ=1. Retired 12,499,991,230 instructions in 5B cycles (44m29s wall time). CPI at limit: 0.400. Single iteration of 1024 CRC ops — already at minimum workload, no further reduction possible without altering benchmark semantics.

infeasible.name: edn
infeasible.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit at LOCAL_SCALE_FACTOR=1, CPU_MHZ=1. Retired 13,000,000,936 instructions in 5B cycles (45m10s wall time). CPI at limit: 0.385. Parameters N=100, ORDER=50 could theoretically be reduced, but requires cross-compilation rebuild.
infeasible.reduction_possible: N=100, ORDER=50 could be reduced but requires cross-compiler rebuild

infeasible.name: statemate
infeasible.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit at LOCAL_SCALE_FACTOR=1, CPU_MHZ=1. Retired 9,210,526,236 instructions in 5B cycles (35m17s wall time). CPI at limit: 0.543. Complex auto-generated state machine with no obvious size reduction parameter.

infeasible.name: primecount
infeasible.reason: Exceeded 5B cycle limit at LOCAL_SCALE_FACTOR=1, CPU_MHZ=1, SZ=3, NPRIMES=9 (already maximally reduced). Retired 9,999,999,968 instructions in 5B cycles (42m49s wall time). CPI at limit: 0.500. No further reduction possible — SZ=3 is the absolute minimum.

infeasible.name: huffbench
infeasible.reason: CI timeout after 2h30m wall-time; test killed before reaching 5B cycle limit; running in memory-intensive loop (Memory.Write64)
infeasible.reduction_possible: TEST_SIZE=500 could be reduced but requires cross-compiler rebuild

infeasible.name: matmult-int
infeasible.reason: CI timeout; never started due to huffbench consuming full job allocation (4h10m); expected to exceed 5B cycles based on compute intensity
infeasible.reduction_possible: UPPERLIMIT=20 could be reduced (e.g. to 5) but requires cross-compiler rebuild
